alert.note: Alert for Barton; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:47AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Russell and northwestern Barton Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 347 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Milberger, or 10 miles north of Hoisington, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russell, Dorrance, Milberger, Bunker Hill, Galatia, Susank, Wilson State Park, Wilson Lake and Russell Airport. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 184 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
